meanings.sent1: Carrying the onus of taking care of the family fell on the eldest sibling.
meanings.sent2: It is the onus of every citizen to contribute to the betterment of society.
meanings.sent3: The onus of remembering to feed the pet fish was forgotten by the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The onus of leadership weighed heavily on her shoulders during the crisis.
meanings.sent5: The onus of studying hard to achieve good grades rests on the student's determination.

meanings.sent1: As a teacher, it is her onus to educate and inspire her students.
meanings.sent2: The onus of honesty lies in always telling the truth.
meanings.sent3: The onus of returning the library books on time was forgotten by the student.
meanings.sent4: The onus of friendship is to support each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The onus of kindness is a responsibility we should all embrace in our daily lives.
